website_summaries.verdict: Though this isn't a good choice for routinely treating your dog, it's a great option if you want a flavorful way to give your dog joint-benefiting supplements.
pros: Tasty treats that also contain joint-soothing ingredients – each treat offers 300 mg glucosamine and 50 mg chondroitin
Beef flavor, and beef is also the top ingredient
cons: You can't just feed freely- recommended dosage must be followed and is based on weight
Some issues of stale product upon arrival have been reported

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product...rather my dog loves it...her brother and sister cannot even sniff at it when she's chomping away on one. Our rescue dog Nell one day suddenly started limping...she's only about 3yrs old but had a hard life prior to being rescued. Its a strange thing cause she would play and run very well but then go back to limping. However, we noticed from the time we stated her on this product the limping stopped. I have to admit when i was looking for a product to help her i almost chose something else which was double the cost of this but im happy i decided to give this a try. Thumbs up. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Ereika ClementsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: keep your dog moving!
customer_reviews.text: If your dog is aging or moving slowly try these! My Doxie has had spinal surgery & is semi-impaired but she doesn't know it! Since giving her Zukes she has been running around like she's on meth (it's a riot!!)...we even caught her going up 2 of the doggie stairs trying to "shop" for more treats while playing with her canine sisters. She is 11 years old, & has been semi-paralyzed since she was 5, but these treats keep her lively. She is a happy, healthy girl, & when she's happy, we're happy. If you love your dog, try these!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Cured my old dogs knee and joint issues! Thank you Zuke's!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these dog treats delivered monthly with Amazon's subscribe and save for about six months and I'm super impressed. I needed a dog treat that helped with my aging dogs (10 & 11 years old) for their bones and joints but also something tasty for them. My 11 year old JRT has had knee/joint issues for years now but after having these daily treats, I'm happy to say she hasn't had anymore issues. She can jump up onto our bed and on our couch now, where it use to be very difficult and she wouldn't even try. Thank you Zuke's!
customer_reviews.author: S. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product the end of March. My dog weighs over 100lbs and has had hip and knee problems for a long time. Besides feeding him better dog food now and him loosing weight, he does not get much excercise. He has a hard time getting up and he would just scoot around in a circle. I started him on Zukes the 1st of April. It has been 3 weeks and I can tell the difference already with him standing. He has a mind of his own and I sometimes can not get him to move. But he loves his Zukes..
customer_reviews.author: Sandrc

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: We have a small 12 year old dog that's having a difficult time getting up and down the stairs to the point of often not even attempting the stairs anymore. After giving her 1/2 a treat once a day for a couple days, she seems much more willing and able to go up and down the stairs. Cant say for sure if this product is the reason but it's been a couple months now and she's still doing better then she was prior to the treats. Just a note, this doesn't smell real good and our other dog turns her nose up at it but fortunately the dog that seems to benefit from it willing takes it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Danger

customer_reviews.title: My Pom hates it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my pom absolutely refuses to consume it. He detests it. It could be that he is a very picky eater and that I chose the wrong flavor (peanut butter) but unfortunately, I had to dispose of it. However, the order arrived on time and the contents seem fresh. I've purchased a lot of Zuke's other products and my Pom loves them. I think this is a matter of preference and he prefers something else rather than these treats.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good treat but my dog was allergic
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything bad because I do think they are good treats and my dog really liked them. However, after giving to him for a couple weeks we found out he's allergic to them because he chewed a spot raw on his tail. We stopped giving him the treats (only thing that was new added to his diet) and the chewing of the tail has stopped and is starting to heal.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie LaBute

customer_reviews.title: A Great Supplement Disguised as a Treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them. I break them into small pieces and get him to do tricks. I compared the active ingredients to many of the more expensive supplements and they are comparable. My dog is nine years old, 50 lbs and so far does not have any joint issues. I started supplementing his diet with these treats and Salmon oil as pre-emptive measures. A friend has a older lab who just started showing signs of joint stiffness. I recommended these treats and within days he recovered his stride. So I'm sold and they are so much less expensive here than in any of my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: MizDeeAustin

customer_reviews.title: May give dogs diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: This product gave my dogs diarrhea when all of the other Zukes treats haven’t. This is the first time I’ve given them the hip action formula so I don’t know if it’s the way the product is made or a bad lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kaloustian

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, Zuke's!
customer_reviews.text: These treats have helped my dog, George, so much!! I didn't realize just how much until I ran out and within a couple days he was having back end difficulties. I will never be without these again. My vet had recommended a supplement they carry with eggshell membrane that was $95.00 a month. I saw Zuke's had it and started him on them about a year ago. Thank you, thank you, thank you from me and George.
customer_reviews.author: Doe Z

customer_reviews.title: Good product, price keeps fluctuating.
customer_reviews.text: This is not so much about the product as it is of the distributor. The product itself is very good- my dogs enjoy it and I think it has made a difference for our senior dog. However, I had a subscribe and save set up for monthly deliveries and the price changed every month (and nearly doubled). I don't care to be subscribed to something that I'll never know what the actual cost is going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: His hips are doing just as well as on the other medication and he is even running and playing like he used to
customer_reviews.text: My dog would not eat the other treats because the smell of the medication was too overpowering. My dog loves these treats and eats them with no issue. His hips are doing just as well as on the other medication and he is even running and playing like he used to. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SHPGIRL

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Won't Eat
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes the regular Zukes treats, but he will not eat these. I'll have to give them away or toss them out. I gave a one star review because they're no good if my dog won't eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Show Me MO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product that Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years for my dogs. When one of my babies turned 12, she began having trouble jumping into the car because of her hips. I purchased this product and within a month saw an amazing difference in her agility and movement and range of motion. She lived until she was 19 years old and I believe wholeheartedly that this product helped her to live a comfortable life. I've been giving this to my Lab since she was a year old in order to circumvent problems with hips in the future. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Wrenspirit

customer_reviews.title: 12 year old dog is young again!
customer_reviews.text: Our 12year old lab/greyhound girl is getting very stiff and arthritic, especially in her back legs. She’s been stiff and looking uncomfortable. We bought these treats for her in hopes it’ll bring her some relief and let me tell you! She is jumping and hopping and running around like she did when she was 7. I’m in tears, I’m so happy. 4 days in and I’ve seen a huge change in her comfort and activity levels. She’s still old and sleepy but she’s active and not stiff anymore! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: They worked for my granddog an elderly shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My granddog who is a shepherd type and very old was cripple and looked like his hip may have been dislocated on the trip to my house. I had him for about 10 days and started him on the hip treats right away. He improved each day and was nearly his youthful self. Not sure if he was just glad to be in a house with carpeting that helped him walk better or the hip treats helped. I'm thinking it was the hip treats so I sent him home with nearly two bags.
customer_reviews.author: Dale S.

customer_reviews.title: i've noticed a difference
customer_reviews.text: my dog is a 14 year old chihuahua/dachsund mix (so we think). he usually has really bad arthritis during the cold months and cries whenever he jumps up onto the couch/down the couch. I've been using these for at least 9 months now and give him 1 treat a day (he weighs about 10 lbs) and i've noticed such a difference. He never cries anymore with his activity. He loves eating them (he's usually picky), and it just makes me an overall happy dog momma! Thank you!! and thanks to the reviewers who left reviews saying that it also worked for their dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard, going back to the beef flavor
customer_reviews.text: Even with a very sharp knife the peanut better/oat blend is very hard to cut into smaller pieces, unlike the beef flavor. The package has an expiration date of Dec 2019 so I assume the hardness is by design and not from it going stale. Flavor wise, my dog doesn't have any complaints so 3*.
customer_reviews.author: anon12345

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Item
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a couple of years for my dog who has arthritis in one front leg. I had tried several other products before trying this one out. All the others upset her sensitive stomach. I was surprised this product did not make her sick and there was noticeable improvement in her walking within days. Within a couple of weeks her limp was completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: OregonRose

customer_reviews.title: like they get in a pouch that has been open ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the pouch, I noticed that the treats were rock-hard; like they get in a pouch that has been open for a couple of weeks. They are supposed to be chewy ( I've been buying them from other vendors for over a year.) The "Best By" date on the bottom of the pouch is 3 July 2017. So we're almost 4 months past that. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Zuke's but Hate this one
customer_reviews.text: A couple of my dogs are getting older so thought why not a little Zuke's treat for their hips. BAHAHA No way. These dogs wouldn't try them at all. Stuck one in their mouth and they spit it out and walked away. I really like Zuke's treats (the dog's do anyway)..I ended up feeding these to the neighbor's Aussie who always comes by to say hi every day. He loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Connie B CTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Treats are always hard when I purchase them from Amazon! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I love these treats for our dogs, but there is a huge difference when you buy them in a store, vs. getting them off Amazon. I kept trying thinking maybe it was just a bad batch. The PB is the worst, so we switched to chicken and beef. The beef are harder also, but when you buy the chicken ones in the store they are much softer even where you can form them into balls.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Breckenridge

customer_reviews.title: Hard Treats
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been giving these treats to our dog for a couple years now and they are normally soft and chewy. I bought 2 packages via subscribe and save and both packages the treats are hard as rocks! We had to throw both of them away.
customer_reviews.author: C. Press

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was the fourth product I have tried for my dog. All needed to be added to my dogs food. This product was great because I can give it as a treat. I break it up in small pieces. This has really helped my dogs legs. My dog is 12 years old recently had a sprained back leg. My dog has more energy and is able to go for walks again. I give her this treat before her dinner meal which this treat also helped with her appetite. Zuke's has a great customer service as I had questions about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves These Moist Treats
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rate the flavor because I've never tasted one. I have no way of knowing whether these treats actually help my dog's hip & joints. I give them to her HOPING they will delay the onset of arthritis. I dan't prove it, but I trust that Zuke uses high-quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Neschie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good moist treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 13 year old Chihuahua and these treats are nice and moist so they are easier for him to eat. He must love the taste because he devours them. They are easy to break up and put inside his Kong toy too. I'm picky about treats for them but I've never had an issue with Zukes so I tend to keep with them.
customer_reviews.author: OlyNomad

customer_reviews.title: Six of six hound dogs say more please! Good ingredients, meaty smell, bite size squares, resealable bag.
customer_reviews.text: All of my dogs love these and like all of the Zukes treats we've tried, I really like the ingredients and over all quality of the treats as well. Opening the bag releases a distinct meaty smell and since it's a resealable bag, that happens every time. These are a little bigger than the other Zuke's jerky treats and they are definitely chewier than the other versions, These break in half easily if you're using them as a training bite reward, but these also have a slight coating on the top surface, so I need to wipe my fingers off after passing these out. I've seen no digestive troubles for any of my dogs with these.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & Horses

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my Akita, a dog that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Akita, a dog that was approximately 150 lbs. He had an awful limp, and his arthritis clearly bothered him as he'd often whine from pain. After some time of feeding him these treats, his limp all but went away, and he never whined from his joint pain again. I couldn't find these treats soon enough! It's gut wrenching hearing your dog whine, and there's nothing you can do about it without throwing pain medicine down his throat. Thanks to Zuke's, my old pup looks forward to these treats, drools all over my lap for them, and I don't have to force feed him! Effective and apparently delicious! Win/win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Pegah A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality has plummeted!!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this brand for our dog for the last 3 years. The past 2 bags of these treats have been so rock hard (upon opening), that we had to heat them a bit to try to soften them. Our dog does not have all of his teeth, so we liked that these were good for his hips, but they were soft and easy to chew. We are very disappointed in the increased price for decreased quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But one in her food in the morning and another in her food in the evening (about a 1lb bag a month) and she has lost about 10 po
customer_reviews.text: Took about 2 weeks to see a difference and another 3 or 4 for my 9 year old German Shepherd to get back to her youthful self. But one in her food in the morning and another in her food in the evening (about a 1lb bag a month) and she has lost about 10 pounds and is jumping all around now just like she used to do.
customer_reviews.author: CoachDavid

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog hated these. She picked it up chewed a couple of times and spit it out. They smelled gross and had a weird texture.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible, but just kind of weird
customer_reviews.text: These treats are enormous so I have to break them up into 4 pieces, even for my large pup. It wouldn't be so bad, as I'm now learning that these are usually soft, but the ones I got are hard as a rock. My dog who will eat anything did not like them. Nonetheless, after hearing that Zuke's sadly sold out to Nestle/Purina, I don't feel good about buying them anymore. I really thought Zuke's were a good product but I guess in the end they only cared about the profit as well. Also can't say if these helped my girl as far as mobility, but she gets Cosequin and Rimadyl daily anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jillia

customer_reviews.title: Good product for older dog with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glucosamine treats for our old dog Teddy. He was having a lot of issues with getting up off the floor. After he started taking these on a daily basis, we noticed he was walking easier and was able to get up without such a struggle. I think they are well worth the price for any older dog with arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: valerie k

customer_reviews.title: Alright product, seems it could do better with the flavor aspect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two dogs. One of them loved them and the other dog would not eat them. Probably won’t buy them again simply because one of my dogs would not eat them. Maybe it was just the flavor. I got peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I found these. I wanted an easy way to give our soon to be 12 year old doxie glucosamine and chondroitin and thankfully he loves them! As he suffers from food (and seasonal) allergies, they met all of our criteria- no soy, wheat or corn, and most importantly, are made in the USA. Because of those allergies, our poor little guy has to choke down 4 Rx pills a day. These treats are especially nice because they give him a daily dose without him knowing they're actually good for him. All he knows is it is yummy which makes this fur-mom very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Florida GalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves Zuke's Hip Action Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Zuke's Hip Action treats. She is almost 12 years old and I think that they help her because she loves to run at the park. She recently had knee surgery and I am not sure if they helped with her recovery, but she recovered really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love Them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go crazy for these- I actually started breaking them up into smaller pieces for marker training. Always been happy with Zuke’s minis as training treats, decided to try these for my older dog. Doubt it’ll make a noticeable different for his gait but they can’t hurt :)
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Great product-no digestive upset
customer_reviews.text: My dog has developed hip issues and was having some trouble getting around. These daily supplement/treats helped him a lot. No more limping or walking delicately. He’s running and jumping again. This was the second brand I tried. The first brand gave him very bad diarrhea but this one does not upset his digestion at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Helping Keep my Older Dogs Happy and Active!
customer_reviews.text: These really help my 2 dogs with joint issues (one has a bad knee and the other has kind of arthritic joints). I find that they really help the arthritic guy stay comfortable... he's able to enjoy long walks and only limps now when he goes for a run (whereas before he would limp with any activity)... and with the one with a bad knee, they really help when the weather gets bad. One dog is 25 lbs, and the other is 11 lbs, and I give them each 1 treat each night... I'll probably up it for the 25-lb guy as he gets older and more arthritic... but SUPER happy with these treats.
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love these treats!
customer_reviews.text: These treats are amazing. I have a 14 going on 15 year old Boston Terrier that was having trouble getting around. After about a week I could already see the improvement. She seemed happier, was getting around better, and ever running around with my puppy. After using this product for about 1 month she has lost weight and is doing great going up and down the stairs by herself without looking for help. I would absolutely recommend this product. I am extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It worked on my dog
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have a12 year old Golden Retriever that was falling down almost every 3 steps. After a week of using this she is not falling down any more. She walks around almost normal now. Honestly I thought my dogs days were numbered.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kilby

customer_reviews.title: KEEP YOUR DOGS HIPS HEALTHY!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 11-yr. old grand dog”. I’ve been giving them to him (and his parents have too) since he was a puppy. He LOVES them! I believe that the nutrients in this treat are partly responsible for him still being able to jump up on the sofa as easily as he does:).
customer_reviews.author: Victoria E. Wray-Moss

customer_reviews.title: Beef or PB work well
customer_reviews.text: The beef or peanut butter flavors work well for Roxy, she loves the flavors. The glucosamine has worked well as a supplement over the past four years for our aging pup. Our only real complaint about the Zuke's Hip Action treats are we will randomly get a batch that breaks apart and crumbles in the sealed bag.
customer_reviews.author: The Hulls

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t Be Happier
customer_reviews.text: These are great! In addition to the fact that my dog just loves them, they have completely turned his health and activity level around. I think that the kind I used before just wasn’t absorbed by his body the way Zuke’s is. I couldn’t be happier ... er, maybe I could if they were shipped in a box with air pocket protection and didn’t arrive in an envelope in crumbles, then I would really be happy! Thank you Zuke’s!!
customer_reviews.author: Miz Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Treats
customer_reviews.text: The dogs absolutely love these. Flavorwise, it has to be their favorite. They know which jar they are in and that's the one they sit by at treat time. The treats are good for them, too. I have German Shepherds, so I worry about their hips. They can be a bit pricey, so I try to find them on sale. Really glad to find them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: HARD AS ROCKS FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: First of all- my Dachshund loves these and their the best thing I’ve found to prevent typical breed issues with hip & joints. Bought 3x’s from amazon because price &delivery is great. ALL TIMES THEY ARRIVED HARD AS ROCKS! they are not expired and I did t leave open. No idea what they’re doing wrong but it’s a total waste of an amazing product. Went to dog store and will NEVER order these from amazon again.if anyone knows how to rehydrate them- that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My dog had the worst luxating patella episode of her life after two months on this so I don't trust that the ingredients are potent or effective. Additionally only one out of my three dogs will even touch these.
customer_reviews.author: rmp

customer_reviews.title: I love Zuke's
customer_reviews.text: We have an old 11 year old Golden who has become finicky to having his breakfast and dinner not be so plain anymore. These break up into little pieces easily that we mix with his food and gets him to eat instead of staring at us waiting for us to make his dish more palatable haha. We were unable to take the Cosequin chewables as an ingredient made him itch badly so this was a great alternative to getting some much needed vitamins in his gut.
customer_reviews.author: ARL

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on my dogs joints. Soon after I started giving them to him he was having a much easier time walking around. It was so refreshing to see something that worked so well and took away the pain from my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jsnissan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Received order timely and received as represented. I have a 12 yo Labradoodle that is extremely picky with food and treats, let alone pill taking. Have tried everything to get his medication down and no matter my creativity, he will eat the goodies and spit out the pill! Read the reviews on this product and thought I'd give it a try. I opened the bag and, with his keen sense of smell, he was all about it! Taking that as a really good sign, gave him one. He loved it and wanted more! I would highly recommend if you have a finicky pooch like mine. He actually looks forward to taking his "medication" now! Hope it lasts....
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these treats ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing these for more than 2 years now and have them on subscription. No rancid smells, nothing weird. I have 1 dog who had hip surgery and I can tell that these help him by the way he walks. When my dogs hear the bag opening they come running! Mind you, 1 treat is good for a dog under 45lbs! I have 2 dogs who are about 8lbs each, so I split them in half and 1 bag can last me a good while. I've also tried the beef flavor & they like those also. I think I went back to chicken because they were slightly more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: This is the Hip/Joint Treats you've been looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW Zukes Hip Action treats are like no other products out there for your pups joints! Started purchasing this product back in December 2017 when my 10year old Boxer was a slow mover when getting up from her bed, or having some trouble going up/down the stairs. Since giving her 2 treats a day of Zukes( 1 after breakfast, 1 after dinner) it has been nothing but a new journey for my pup!! Night and day difference just after 3days!! Will continue to be a customer of Zukes Products for a LONG TIME!!! THANK YOU ZUKES!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeremi

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them and they seem to help. My dog that's almost 11 had a rough bout of Lyme disease and has had hip trouble since. We give her these daily and she still eats them (meaning she hasn't got sick of the taste) and she's pretty spry for her age.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen M

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them, they are consistent and stay fresh
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them, they are consistent and stay fresh (ALTHOUGH I VACUUM PACK THEM. Wish they were available in lamb as well; too much beef and my dog is allergic to chicken whicn which in in majority of dog foods and treats.
customer_reviews.author: Stan the Mann

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but the batch I just received is very hard. The last batch was soft and chewy, but these are very hard and difficult for my dogs to chew. I’ve ordered this product for the last two years and have been happy with it, but I think some of the bags may be older than others
customer_reviews.author: L. Glazer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs won't eat , to hard
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if you made changes to this product but my dogs won't eat it anymore even my pug that will eat anything. Product say chewable but this is stiff the date on the bag is still good until next year. Only way to get my dogs to eat them is to use a chef knife to cut them up into small pieces that's how hard they are.
customer_reviews.author: handheld

customer_reviews.title: He loves loves loves
customer_reviews.text: my dog LOVES these. he gets stiff joints a lot because of how much he loves to play. Especially now that he is 8 years old. I try to give him one daily, or one half because he is a small dog. He rarely ever limps now:) before i got him these it was normal for him to limp at night, hasn't done so since ive been giving him these! :)) would reccomend for a young or aging dog. Healthy hips are important for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: brooke husing

customer_reviews.title: They are a pair of miniature schnauzers and they love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are so spoiled!! They get treats when we get home from work and when they get up in the morning. They are a pair of miniature schnauzers and they love these treats, but what dogs wouldn't love soft, flavored treats multiple times in a day. I currently get these treats shipped monthly along with several other Zuke's treats because my dogs seem to cater to the flavor and consistency plus the fact that my dogs have to watch the amount of protein they ingest and Zuke's treats are on the low side of the protein ladder. I have been giving them to my dogs for about 6 months and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: volksman

customer_reviews.title: I can tell when I don't give him any for a few days he doesn't put his weight on his leg and seems stronger and happier when I d
customer_reviews.text: These help my dog a lot, I can tell when I don't give him any for a few days he doesn't put his weight on his leg and seems stronger and happier when I do give them to him. Only 4 stars because he likes the peanut butter flavor better, but these work just the same. I went for these because for some reason they're cheaper on amazon than peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: jdsandara

customer_reviews.title: Give the correct dose!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 10 year old bichon mix. She loves the flavor and I started by giving her one per day. I had been giving them to her for about 3 months, when I noticed she had become constipated. After doing the math of dogs weight x 0.023 = number of treats, I realized she should only be getting 1/4 to 1/2 a treat. So I have cut her back and do not see any problems now.
customer_reviews.author: ktkann

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend these to anyone who has a dog with hip ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two bags of these now and feel they do help my bulldog who doesnt necessarily have hip problems, but tends to be a little stiff. I've noticed him making some jumps and moving around in ways he generally looked uncomfortable doing before. On top of that, these are made in the USA which is comforting as a pet lover. He loves both the peanut butter and beef flavored. I would highly recommend these to anyone who has a dog with hip issues or is prone to them.
customer_reviews.author: Review Junky

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong flavor and german shepherd doesn't like them
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 packs of beef and they sent me peanut butter. My daughter is allergic to peanut butter and now we have to be very careful to keep the dogs away when they have these. My dog was in a lot of pain with his hips, so I didn't want to waste a week trying to get an exchange. Also, my german shepherd doesn't like them and I have to beg him to eat two of them. He loves peanut butter, so they did a poor job with the smell and flavoring. I am still giving three stars because the medicine seems to be helping his hips.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. Buddy is an old guy now, almost 14 and has joint pain issues. These work very well, he still gets around pretty well and tries to act like he is 4. He gets incredibly excited when he sees me reach for the bag at bedtime, he loves these. The packages I received were just fine, they were not the least bit "stale". All were very moist, soft and Buddy enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Strommy

customer_reviews.title: These FANTASTIC treats will make your dogs do tricks that they didn't know they could do :D
customer_reviews.text: I first found these at a posh speciality pet store, and truly thought that my little Maltese wouldn't like them since they were healthy. I tried them since Maltese are known for easily breaking their hips when jumping off of beds, and these support hip and joints. Wow, was I amazed! She goes CRAZY over these!!! She prefers these to real bacon, real ground steak, chicken, peanut butter, etc. Since my dog is only 7 pounds, and has teeth removed, I cut them into little squares, so one bag is SO economical. My dog can't get enough of the "Roasted Beef" flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treats
customer_reviews.text: I got a couple of packages that were broken into pieces, but that problem has corrected itself and once again they are coming in great condition. My two girls love these snacks. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These have become a staple in our house
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 year old, 80-lb old man has some generalized aches and pains now that he's getting on up in years. I decided to try these after remembering my Dad giving my childhood dog glucosamine to help with joint pain. These are awesome. He's been on them for about a year now and the difference is amazing. Doggo acts about 5 years younger and has far fewer episodes of joint stiffness. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Dogs didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs will literally eat anything, but they both reacted funny to this treat. Not sure if it's the strong smell or the flavor. One dog sniffed it and ran away. The other dog grabbed it and immediately spit it out. Tried mixing it with other treats and they ate around it.
customer_reviews.author: Bender Bending Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: My puggle is 13yrs old, hobbles a bit. I tried these and I SEE it working. I SEE her walking good again, I tried CBD salve before and I just coudn't get these type of results. I am not saying it will work for every dog, but it sure does work for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Something Has Changed
customer_reviews.text: My dog has eaten 1 hip action treat every morning for the last 3 1/2 years, since she had back surgery after an acute injury left her partially paralyzed. She has turned her nose up at this last bag every single morning. Something must have changed, because she loved these treats before!
customer_reviews.author: ep

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be working well. Our older Golden Retriever seems more comfortable (less groaning with effort and discomfort) when laying down and getting up now. Everyone remarks on how you'd never know she is 11 years old. These treats have apparently helped in this respect. Compared to other similar products, the price is better and the portions more generous. They also smell "meaty" (in a good way). Made in the USA by people who obviously love dogs. Very pleased with this product. Somewhat saddened to see this company has been bought out by Ralston-Purina. Can only hope the same quality will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stone

customer_reviews.title: The vet recommended some NSAIDS but I didn't want to fight to ...
customer_reviews.text: My elderly dog has been slowing down and exhibiting stiffness in the morning. The vet recommended some NSAIDS but I didn't want to fight to give him pills every day plus I was concerned they'd mess up his stomach. I took him for a dog massage and they recommended these Zuke's Hip Action treats. The massage therapist recommended trying the milder combination of herbs before going to the harsher NSAIDS. My dog loves these. They clearly smell like treats not medicine. We've observed a decrease in his pain and stiffness as well as better mobility. Definitely recommend trying this before going to medications.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebak

customer_reviews.title: My finicky eater loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 year old very spoiled mini schnauzer. I have a hard time finding anything that she will eat, especially if it is good for her. She immediately loved this and now expects it nightly. I started off with 1/2 and increased to a whole square (torn in 4 pieces) after seeing she did not show any negative side effects. She is on her 2nd bag and shows an improvement in her mobility. This will be a staple in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Collins

customer_reviews.title: New life for 13 yr old Lab with knee/hip issues :)
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of different supplements for our 13 yr old Lab, none helped, she limped (knee injury) and mostly walked on 3 legs, hips became very stiff, her appetite diminished. I noticed an immediate response in her activity after giving her these and believe me I was skeptical to try something yet again. She's using all 4 legs to walk now, she's running again and going up stairs quickly. She has new life in her, bouncing energy, alert and wanting to play constantly. We are marveled at how this product has changed her and our lives. Just 2 a day, she is crazy for these, she always loves her treats but this stuff she absolutely loves.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great and so easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! They showed up quickly and they really seem to help her mobility. She's an 11 year old Jack Russell and very active so it was really hard to see her hobbling around all of the time. After taking these, she has more spring in her step and is almost back to her young self. My dad now orders them regularly for her. So much easier than trying to give her pills. And as a picky dog (she is kind of a treat snob) she actually really loves the taste of them too! So glad we made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: My YORKIE is under 5 lbs. She is 1.5 years old and I decided to give her some extra protection to her sweet fragile bones. I can't tell you how pleased I am that she is delighted by this product. I would seriously recommend it to others with fussy pets as Gabby loves it. It's a bit large but I break it up into 4 treats and she is beyond happy.
customer_reviews.author: Patte Atkins-Grad

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working Our German Shepherd I start to have some hip issues getting off the couch so we started him on these and seems to be helping a lot after a few weeks it’s pretty consistent
customer_reviews.author: Jon Perry

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these and so do I
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden Retriever and Chesapeake Bay Retriever both love their Zukes Hip Action. They get so excited when the bag comes out that they can't even control their bodies long enough to sit still and wait for them. They wiggle everywhere! They seem to like all flavors equally so I always just buy whatever is cheapest on Amazon when I order them. I love these because they are made from USA sourced ingredients and are free of soy, wheat and corn which cause our golden retriever's skin to break out. The only thing that could possibly make me like these more would be if the price were lower but I guess you have to pay for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karate4566

customer_reviews.title: If your pup already has hip/joint issues talk to your vet about better alternative. If you have a young/healthy pup like ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them & has no idea he's getting a treat. The dosage is fairly low, so this is more of a general preventative measure than any real treatment. If your pup already has hip/joint issues talk to your vet about better alternative. If you have a young/healthy pup like mine but have some concerns based on their general activity or breed, then these are a good place to start. My 45lb german shepherd mix get 2 of these a day stuffed into his kong toy along with some baby carrots & he eats every bit!
customer_reviews.author: E.J.

customer_reviews.title: High-quality and fresh
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. They come in big, juicy pieces and look fresh. I think they look more delicious than some human food. Made in the USA and healthy for dogs. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: We religiously give one of these to our 8 year old dog each morning. She has some joint problems so it feels good as an owner to give her something that might potentially help the little dog. She looks forward to it and stands by the door each morning until she has her treat. The feed store by our house sells zukes - they focus on top quality products which leads me to believe this is one. These make our dog happy which makes us happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these treats. I researched different treats and compared the amounts of glucosamine and chondroitin, and this product had the most per treat - for a reasonable price. (Of course, there were more expensive supplements with higher amounts!) My dogs love them, too! They are very meaty smelling, and tender. I give my 100 lb Doberman 2 per day and my 40 lb Queensland Heeler 1 per day. I also love getting them delivered automatically every month with Subscribe and Save!
customer_reviews.author: 831 Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Moves a little better Me: Tears of joy
customer_reviews.text: Me: Adopts seven-year old lab Lab is obese Labs are prone to hip dysplasia Lab has been run over (not just hit but full-on run over) by a minivan ... Wonders why dog doesn't move well Wonders why dog is slow to get up and down ... Orders Hip Action dog treats Obese, old, minivan-run-over lab: MOM! YOU GOT ME THE MOST TASTIEST TREATS OF ALL TIME IN HISTORY EVER! MORE MORE MORE! ... Moves a little better Me: Tears of joy. Even a small win for my dog is an enormous win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alley Goyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at how well these worked
customer_reviews.text: Even though other reviewers mentioned how these treats helped their aging dogs with hip and joint problems walk better, I am still amazed at how well they worked on our dog. She used to hobble a lot after getting up from laying down too long and she wouldn't jump up on most furniture anymore. After a month of these treats she walks much better. She still won't jump on the higher furniture, but that could just be out of habit. We've picked her up for so long, she might be spoiled lol
customer_reviews.author: Gene C

customer_reviews.title: My Great Dane refused to eat
customer_reviews.text: Received this product. My Great Dane , Stetson, saw the bag and got excited. I opened an pulled the treat out and offered. He sniffed and immediately turned to see if there was something else coming out of bag. HE ABSOLUTELY REFUSES TO EAT THIS TREAT. No problem in the past with other brands. This was a new one for both of us as I could not get to the store or his vets office. So I am stuck with a bag of treats.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Simeral

customer_reviews.title: My dog is a picky eater and doesn't usually like joint supplements
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater and doesn't usually like joint supplements, but he loves these and can't wait to eat them. I also love the fact that they're made with natural ingredients. They actually have better ingredients than a lot of people food! Thank you Zukes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fountain of Youth for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our oldest dog had sore or stiff joints and couldn't hop on things anymore and had been that way for a year. She was 9 years old. Within a week or two of giving her these daily, she suddenly started hopping up on things without issue and able to play more with the other dogs. Now she's 12 and still going strong and the vet is amazed. All our dogs now get these. The only downside is that I have to give them to the dogs quickly or they leave huge drool puddles.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Very moist!
customer_reviews.text: We use Zuke's treats often, so when I was looking for glucosamine supplement for my dogs, that was naturally what I look for. The treats are very nicely sized and stay moist the entire bag through. We bought beef the first time and it actually smells like beef bullion cubes, it smells quite quite yummy! I usually gave it to them right around dinner time, and I can't think of a better appetizer :-) they absolutely love it and while I can't say for sure how well it works, I can say they're very playful and enjoy running and jumping!
customer_reviews.author: Allyse W. Lande

customer_reviews.title: Something changed
customer_reviews.text: We used to love these and had them on auto-ship but the last 6 bags have been really hard. The expiration dates are still good. It's a shame, we had to cancel our auto-ship.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: These make a HUGE difference in my older dog!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is getting up there in age (around 15-17) and has bad joints that make it hard for him to walk, get up, and walk up our single step into our house. Giving him these chews makes him a puppy again. He runs around and plays more as well. It's fantastic! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: these are great vitamin treats for my dogs hips/joints. she was initially on chewable pills, but know refuses to take them (i cannot be blame her, it is like chewing a huge pill and i am sure it tastes terrible). i opted for a soft treat and having using Zukes before regular treats, I was happy they offered one for her hips/joints. They arrived promptly, do not smell terrible and best of all, my pup loves them! she comes running full speed at me when i take the bag off the counter. def a good buy. i only wish they had them as subscribe and save so i could save a little more.
customer_reviews.author: ankurbs

customer_reviews.title: Both my dogs love these and their pain has gone away!
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs LOVE these! They get 1 a day and one of my dogs is very picky! The other one gets sore if she doesn’t have a joint supplement. I’m SO glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistant  Quality
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these but about half the time, they are stale and very hard. I just received two bags that are very hard whereas the last batch I received were a nice, moist consistency. Zuke definitely has a quality control issue.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: These gave my senior dog a whole new lease on life
customer_reviews.text: My thirteen year old dog has been on prescription treats from the vet for her joints for a while now. Recently we moved and hadn't found a new vet so I decided to give these a try until we could get her regular ones. These are so much better and cheaper! My girl has been so frisky, she's like a puppy! It took about a month but she's like a new dog.
customer_reviews.author: klynn

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them, great value for joint support
customer_reviews.text: I really like these dog treats. They are a great price and the dogs seem to love the flavor. They are also a lot cheaper than other joint support treats that I have bought in the past (compare to over $30 for 1 lb!!!) . For our 8 year old Shepherd mix (70 lbs) we give 1 treat both am and pm. For our 4 year old Shepherd mix (55 lbs) we give 1/2 treat am and pm. I'm not sure if they are working, but it makes me feel like Im doing something to help and the dogs love them. I'm adding them to my subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: gwen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to review.... my pug is ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to review.... my pug is getting old and showing signs of hip dysplasia. He will eat anything, seriously anything that is GIVEN to him so I cannot help you people with picky dogs... He is sluggish still. I didn't have unrealistic ex expectations as most people do. I just want to give a little ease for my old boy. Im happy
customer_reviews.author: HowardUdoin

customer_reviews.title: Very effective,  with caveats.
customer_reviews.text: Have fed the roasted chicken Zukes to our 13 yr old miniature dachshund once a day for about 2 years with remarkable results. She was struggling to get up and down, and sometimes could barely walk. Now she walks normally, even runs short distances, and can get up and down steps by herself. That would rate 5 stars. I gave 4 stars because we began caring for our son's 7 yr old dachshund and she cannot tolerate these treats which caused her to develop full body tremors. Caution is indicated. I would recommend starting a dog on 1/2 treat for 3 days. If they show no effects, increase to a full treat.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Good: My dogs enjoy them, and they keep their joints moving right along. Bad: The bags are hell to keep sealed, so I just pour the treats into a quart storage bag, labeled with the different flavors. If the bag's not sealed, the treats get hard.
customer_reviews.author: Mlvlnt

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Results - Be Patient!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful about the effectiveness of this product. After using for about a month, I noticed a change in my elderly dog. She was able to move easier and seemed more comfortable. She has an arthritic shoulder joint that acts up from time to time. I am re-ordering this product based upon the fantastic results. Please understand that this isn't an instant fix. I only gave my girl 1/2 treat as she weighs 17 lbs so it took time to get into her system. The price on Amazon can't be beat especially with Prime free shipping and no sales tax. Will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Bert M

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for big dogs with hip problems
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product; it worked wonders for my dogs arthritis in his hips!! He was able to run around again and enjoy life! Thank you for the wonderful product and time I got to spend with him before he passed. He lived 2 years longer than what the vet said!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Sendewicz

customer_reviews.title: Zuke's Hip Action Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 4 stars because , like a lot of joint supplements, it gave my 17 year old dog a lot of gastro-intestinal problems. I followed the directions, since he is a small dog, giving him one a day with food. I liked the fact that they are soft chews, everything else I found was a hard chewy type of supplement.. He responded very quickly, and started moving along really well. After two weeks, the GI problems started. I stopped the supplements and will reintroduce at only 1/2 the daily dose, and see if that helps him. They made a big improvement with his arthritis, but not so much with his tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne E. Gale

product_meta.title: Zuke's Natural Hip & Joint Dog Treats
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Beef| Size:16 oz. PouchWhether it's a morning walk or a weekend hike, your dog's favorite times are those spent exploring with you. Designed to fuel those adventures and keep the good times going strong, every tasty Zuke's Hip Action hip and joint dog treat contains 300mg of glucosamine and 50mg of chondroitin to support your dog's mobility, plus egg shell membrane in a soft and chewy dog treat crafted to help support joint health. These natural dog treats are crafted in the USA using the Earth's best ingredients like chicken, beef, peanut butter and antioxidant-rich wholefood berries, plus vitamins and minerals, Hip Action contains NO corn, wheat or soy.
feature_bullets: Zuke's Hip Action hip & joint dog treats feature 300mg of glucosamine and 50mg of chondroitin per tender, tasty treat
These natural dog treats contain egg shell membrane to support joint health
With real beef as the #1 ingredient, these soft and chewy dog treats also feature nutrient-rich cherries, turmeric and sesame seeds
No corn, no wheat, no soy. No artificial colors or flavors
Crafted in the USA using the earth’s best ingredients

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
